text: Tomaloke nija pratipalakara ksama arau se'i jannata labhara prayasata pratiyogitata aratirna horaa, yara prasastata akasa arau prthiraira prasastatara darae, yito prastuta karaa haiche se'isakala lokara babe yisakale allaha arau te'omra raachulara prati imana ane. E'ito allahara anugraha, te'om yaka iccha take'i e'ito pradana karae; arau allaha maha anugrahasila
